name: Digging n Giving Garbage
description:
Dig for Garbage, Recycle and Gift it to people. 

Instructions:

To begin you will need to click on digging and begin digging for garbage. Once found some garbage you go to gifting and begin making gifts. If there is garbage collected this will appear above the gifting machine. Click on the garbage and it will automatically enter the machine converting to gifts. Once you have prepared gifts click on Load Vehicle and to move a gift into the vehicle.

Once loaded you can then click on gift and this will send the gifts out to the people or you can sell them instead making extra money. There are upgrades available to speed the digging and gifting process up.

In future versions it will be easier to understand and a full tutorial will be included.
